response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product has been meticulously designed to provide exceptional value and performance. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to you. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it for $15,000. This price reflects not only its market value but also the significant investment we've made into its development and customization for you. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
